response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I estimate its worth to be $15,000 to me. However, considering its importance to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an incredible opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a substantial discount. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask.", "product_price": 12000}
